[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/heft](./heft.md) &gt; [IHeftTaskRunHookOptions](./heft.ihefttaskrunhookoptions.md) &gt; [cancellationToken](./heft.ihefttaskrunhookoptions.cancellationtoken.md)

## IHeftTaskRunHookOptions.cancellationToken property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

A cancellation token that is used to signal that the build is cancelled. This can be used to stop operations early and allow for a new build to be started.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly cancellationToken: CancellationToken;
```
